answerText: Tom Stoppard [or Tomas Straussler][10] Two critics named Birdboot and Moon watch a murder mystery set at Muldoon Manor before becoming involved in the said mystery in this ironic play by Stoppard.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 13 | 2 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This man dramatized the importance of the title musical genre in the Velvet Revolution in his 2006 play Rock 'n' Roll. For 10 points each: [10] Name this playwright who retold the story of Hamlet from the perspective of two minor characters in Rosencrantz and Guildenstern are Dead.
